programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.title: Os rapazes estão em um dia de passeio pelo planetário e um dos funcionários lava o cérebro deles com efeitos visuais para que eles queiram voltar para lá.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert deveria demitir os alimentos gordurosos

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Scott Tenorman é um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele fará o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participação especial: Radiohead.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajudá-lo nesta missão, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman faz uma brincadeira que terminou com um mal-entendido envolvendo seu pai e uma posição um tanto quanto constrangedora. Agora, Butters deve ir a um acampamento de cura gay.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após ver um garoto com Síndrome de Tourette em uma loja, Cartman fica obcecado por isso. Ele descobre que se aparentar ter a doença Tourette, ele poderá dizer o que quiser sem precisar encarar consequências.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Raça Brava, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: No Velho Oeste Bill Tyler, um comerciante de peles, tenta achar com seu melhor amigo, Henry Frapp, o lendário vale conhecido pela enorme quantidade de animais para caçar.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: O Parceiro do Diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax é um assaltante de banco que foi traído e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de prisão.

programme.title: Keoma, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Ao final da Guerra Civil Americana, um pistoleiro mestiço, cansado de fazer da morte um meio de vida, retorna para aquilo que um dia costumava ser seu lar.

programme.title: Terra Bruta, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendário John Ford une-se à estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a história tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o território dos Comanches para resgatar reféns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Crime)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Delivery Macabro, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Uma entregadora de pizza com problemas financeiros precisa lutar por sua vida quando sua última entrega da noite acaba sendo para um grupo de satanistas da alta sociedade que precisam de uma virgem para um sacrifício.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Vou te Seguir na Escuridão, (2020, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Uma mulher deprimida com a morte dos pais se envolve com um homem encantador. Quando ele desaparece misteriosamente após entrar em um prédio mal assombrado, ela promete encontrá-lo mesmo que tenha que atravessar para o mundo do sobrenatural.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Creature Features)

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Creature Features)

programme.title: Kikyo aparentemente ressuscitou e está vivendo como uma sacerdotisa da aldeia. Um monge errante percebe que nem tudo é como parece com ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Sorriso Perverso; Alma Errante de Kikyo

programme.title: Inuyasha procura por Kikyo, mas Agome a encontra primeiro. Kikyo a leva prisioneira e não escuta suas tentativas de explicar o que realmente aconteceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Voz de Kagome e o Beijo de Kikyo

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Acreditando que ele seja seu inimigo, Sango procura Inuyasha em uma busca equivocada de vingança planejada por Narak, que quer Inuyasha morto.

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e seus amigos param para enterrar os mortos, Sango revela a história secreta das origens da Jóia: a própria alma da sacerdotisa Midoriko.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Segredo da Jóia das Quatro Almas é Finalmente Revelado!

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Lago da Escuridão Controlado pelo Deus da Água

programme.title: Sesshomaru está insatisfeito com a espada Tenseiga, e ele exige que o ferreiro Totosai lhe faça outra. Totosai chama o Inuyasha.

programme.title: Inuyasha e Sesshomaru continuam sua batalha, fazendo pleno uso de suas respectivas heranças. Após a luta, Sesshomaru encontra a órfão Rin.

programme.sub-title: A Celebre Espada Escolhe seu Verdadeiro Mestre!

programme.title: Os insetos de Narak roubam um fragmento de Jóia da testa de um youkai urso. A cria de Narak, Kagura, usa um fragmento para controlar a tribo do lobo e Kuga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Plano Ardiloso! Uma Luta de Vida ou Morte!

programme.title: A batalha de Inuyasha contra Kuga continua até que a própria Kagura apareça. A cria de Narak domina os ventos na batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Armadilha de Kagura: A Mestra do Vento!

programme.title: Mirok se reúne com Koharu, uma garota que fugiu de sua aldeia depois que eles se conheceram. Então a irmã mais velha de Kagura, Kanna, usa Koharu para atacar Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Dança de Kagura e Espelho de Kanna

programme.title: Inuyasha continua lutando contra Kagura. O espelho de Kanna revela recursos inesperados quando Inuyasha usa a Ferida do Vento contra ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha exige saber por que Kikyo deu os fragmentos da Jóia que ela roubou de Agome para Narak, que libera um youkai com chifres.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru leva as presas do falecido Goshinki ao renegado aprendiz de Totosai, Kaijinbo, para fazer uma nova espada, enquanto Totosai repara Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A batalha de Kaijinbo com Inuyasha, empunhando a espada Tokijin, termina em destruição, e Kagura sente uma abertura para Sesshomaru destruir seu irmão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kuga quer se vingar de Narak pela morte de seus membros da tribo. Quando o mais novo lacaio de Narak, Juromaru, o desafia, ele tem sua chance.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de uma briga com Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Narak planeja se livrar dos sentimentos de Onigumo por Kikyo dentro dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Coração de Onigumo Ainda Vive em Narak

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que estão escapando com suas garras, e ele não pode ouvir Agome tentando pará-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Verdadeira Natureza do Youkai Não Pode ser Reprimida

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Onda Explosiva! O Ataque Supremo da Tessaiga

programme.title: Avdol procura informações sobre a mansão de DIO no Cairo. Iggy enfrenta dois cães ameaçadores durante um passeio pela cidade.

programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 3

programme.title: Polnareff finalmente enfrenta DIO, mas não consegue se aproximar. De longe, ele libera sua arma secreta para revelar o Stand de seu terrível oponente.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O adeus da longa jornada, amigos

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Angelo consegue entrar no corpo das pessoas. Apesar de Jotaro avisar para não consumirem nada, Josuke surpreende a mãe tomando um gole de café.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para proteger a cidade, Jotaro quer destruir o misterioso arco e flecha que despertou o poder do Stand de Angelo.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi tentam descobrir se o colega de escola Toshikazu Hazamada está mesmo usando um Stand e encontram um boneco de madeira no armário dele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Segredos, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Toni descobre que o seu novo amigo, um talentoso agente livre, está sendo forçado a ajudar contrabandistas perigosos a roubar tesouros nacionais de uma caverna subaquática.

programme.title: Tudo Pela Honra, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe é obrigado a se juntar ao exército do rei Luís XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casará com uma das filhas do rei.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: O Mágico Circo de Noel, (2019, Children)
programme.desc: Karo foge de casa porque seus pais briguentos querem o divórcio. Ela viaja com seus amigos circenses Victor e Tonie do Circus Noël, que podem participar inesperadamente do Cultura Nova, importante festival circense.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O aventureiro Jack Hunter sai em busca de uma tumba lendária, encontrando perigosos velhos adversários e ainda mais perigosas velhas chamas ao longo do caminho.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: Jack Hunter percebe que o túmulo do faraó estar vazio, exceto por uma moeda romana, significa que o tesouro foi saqueado para Roma, mas mais tarde provavelmente transferido para a nova capital bizantina, Constantinopla.

programme.title: O Mágico Circo de Noel, (2019, Children)

programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Olhos de Dragão, (2012, Action)

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)

programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, and Angela Lansbury headline an all-star cast in this daring thriller rife with political intrigue, mental manipulation, and a diabolical plot that may lead to the highest levels of the government.

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain, (1967, Thriller)
programme.desc: A billionaire, intent on destroying Communism by starting a world war, is close to achieving his goal with the help of the world's largest, and most powerful, computer. Secret Agent Harry Palmer (Michael Caine) is the only man who can stop him!

programme.desc: In this comic gem from the legendary Billy Wilder and his long-time writing partner I.A.L. Diamond, Dean Martin is a famous singer targeted by two would-be songwriters who encourage a waitress (Kim Novak) to coerce Dino into a song-buying mood.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)

programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: Dark Blue, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: When the LAPD's Special Investigations Squad is assigned a quadruple homicide, veteran detective Eldon Perry takes the case. Known for his street tactics and a temper, he tutors rookie Bobby Keough in the realities of police intimidation and corruption.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau portray lifelong feuding neighbors making each day a hilarious game of revenge. But then voluptuous Ariel moves in nearby and their dormant hormones reignite in an all-out competition to win her favor.

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this sequel to Grumpy Old Men, a vivacious Italian beauty attempts to convert Wabasha, Minnesota's cherished bait store into a romantic Italian restaurant.

programme.title: The Odd Couple, (1968, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two divorced men decide to share a New York apartment. Fussy Felix, fastidious to a fault. He proves that cleanliness is next to insanity. And Oscar, who wreaks havoc on a tidy room with the speed and thoroughness of a tornado.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Charade, (1963, Thriller)
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: The Odd Couple, (1968, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two divorced men decide to share a New York apartment. Fussy Felix, fastidious to a fault. He proves that cleanliness is next to insanity. And Oscar, who wreaks havoc on a tidy room with the speed and thoroughness of a tornado.

programme.title: Neil Simon's The Odd Couple II, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: The times may have changed, but thankfully not the traits that make ex-roomies Felix Ungar (Lemmon) and Oscar Madison (Matthau) the all-time perfect mismatch.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: The Big Sleep, (1978, Crime)
programme.desc: A grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail turned murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer and a gangster.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.sub-title: Robin's past! The girl who was called a devil!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Five namis? Nami strikes back with mirages!

programme.title: Franky and Nami come up with a plan to stop Chopper’s rampage, but it could prove deadly to the not-so-little reindeer. Usopp and Zoro are thrilled to finally be free of each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's decision! Fire at the out-of-control chopper!

programme.title: Usopp’s ill-advised attempt at bravery threatens to get him killed, but a familiar foot spares the sniper’s life. Luffy struggles to even strike a formidable foe, and Franky races to deliver some very important keys!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hunter sanji makes an entrance? Elegy for a lying wolf!

programme.title: Sanji evens the playing field in his CP9 slugfest by introducing his wolfish opponent to the burning power of the devil’s leg!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery kicks! Sanji's full course of foot techniques!

programme.title: Zoro finally lands a blow against the killer giraffe, but Luffy still can’t find a way to break through against Lucci! Can Frank reach Robin before it’s too late!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce sword attacks! Zoro vs. Kaku, powerful sword fighting showdown!

programme.title: Zoro unleashes a demonic nine sword fighting style on his giraffe opponent, Luffy buys time for Franky by ascending to second gear, and Robin refuses to give up hope of being rescued!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Demon god zoro! An incarnation of asura born from fighting spirit!

programme.title: Spandam cruely drags Robin ever closer to the gates of justice, but the battle takes a turn for the better when the Sniper King makes a surprise appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam frightened! The hero on the tower of law!

programme.title: Luffy’s battle with Lucci reveals the powerful secrets of the rubber man’s second gear, and the Spandam’s thoughtless Buster Call begins with a brutal barrage of cannonballs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin freed! Luffy vs. Lucci, showdown between leaders!

programme.title: When an ancient tree is stolen by a madman with the power to freeze time, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji track down the culprit in an attempt to save a village’s annual festival!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boss luffy is the culprit? Track down the missing great cherry tree!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats, (1943, Drama)
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: John Wayne: Stolen Goods, (1934, Drama)
programme.desc: A town is repeatedly victimized by "The Polka Dot Bandit" and it's up to the Marshall to save the day. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: John Wayne: Cold Vengeance, (1935, Drama)
programme.desc: When his father is gunned down by bandits, John Mason (Wayne) hatches a plot to catch the killer. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: John Wayne: Guns Along The Trail, (1935, Drama)
programme.desc: A government agent goes undercover in a traveling medicine show to infiltrate a gang of counterfeiters. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Peña star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Peña star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Eugene, Ezekiel, Yumiko, and Princess are captured and separated by the mysterious troopers that surrounded them at the rail yard; claustrophobic with mounting anxiety, Princess struggles with memories of her traumatic past and plans to escape.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: At the lowest point in their friendship, Daryl and Carol come to a fork in the road and head their separate ways; Carol returns to Alexandria, while Daryl stays on the road, each going into their own type of survival mode.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl leads a mission team to scavenge the military base he discovered; Maggie tells her story, prompting a new mission for survival that only Negan can lead; Eugene and his group go through assessment by the Commonwealth's paramilitary police.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie's mission takes the team through a subway tunnel, challenged by lurking walkers and a recalcitrant Negan; with Eugene's group, Yumiko seeks answers about her brother and demands expedited processing into the Commonwealth.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A chance encounter provides a potential way home; Daryl makes a tough decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Norman Reedus and actor Kim Coates reunite to ride through Georgia; together they reminisce about how far they've come in their careers and what it means to be part of The Walking Dead family.
programme.desc: Ride With Norman Reedus
programme.sub-title: Walking Dead Country With Kim Coates

programme.title: Hornsby marches Daryl and troops to confront Maggie at Hilltop; after a harrowing heist, Rosita gets Connie, Kelly, Eugene, and Max to investigate the Miltons; Ezekiel helps hospital patients in need.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie prepares to defend Hilltop and the people of Riverbend against Hornsby; Hornsby hires Leah to kill Maggie.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and Negan rush to the Commonwealth to stop Hornsby from going after their families; Pamela deals with protestors demanding justice for Sebastian's crimes; Mercer needs Rosita's help to fight a swarm.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Carol makes a deal with Pamela to wipe the slate clean on behalf of her friends; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah get on the road to Oceanside to fill them in on a plan; the Commonwealth celebrates Founders Day.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Eugene goes on the run after the Founders Day incident; Pamela tasks Mercer to investigate his whereabouts, to Max and Princess' dismay; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah encounter an unusual complication at an abandoned Renaissance Faire.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and Carol investigate the whereabouts of their friends after Pamela disappears them from the Commonwealth; Pamela asks Yumiko to prosecute Eugene on behalf of the Commonwealth.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Separated from their children, Maggie, Gabriel and Rosita track a military convoy to a mysterious destination; Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan and Annie find themselves at a work site; Daryl and Carol follow a train that has taken Connie aboard.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Ezekiel and Negan team up to lead a clandestine labor revolt against the warden; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah catch up with Luke and Jules fleeing Oceanside; Eugene stands trial with Yumiko as his defense attorney.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Alexandrians and the prisoners head back to the Commonwealth to confront Pamela Milton; a swarm approaches the city.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and Carol rush Judith to the hospital; Rosita, Eugene and Gabriel search for Coco; Maggie and Negan take arms against Pamela; as the citizens of the Commonwealth deal with the herd, the heroes assemble for one last stand to save their future.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl Dixon's arrival to France sets off a violent chain of events that inadvertently puts a young boy at the heart of a growing religious movement in danger; Daryl agrees to help shepherd the boy to safety in exchange for help returning to America.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennia’s action is starting to cause a time paradox.
programme.sub-title: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians' Ordeals

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennia’s traps.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennia’s palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that he’s accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Wataru’s Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.
programme.sub-title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya’s star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi’s house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.
programme.sub-title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.
programme.sub-title: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where she’s getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagi’s attention.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each other’s secret identities.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.sub-title: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights' Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.
programme.sub-title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon’s true identity.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.

programme.desc: Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. The Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon’s star seed, the Light of Hope reveals itself. The Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Winter's Bone, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Facing the loss of her home and siblings if she fails, a gutsy teenager sets out on a dangerous quest to learn the fate of her missing father.

programme.title: Booksmart, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Two high school overachievers decide to cram four years of not-to-be missed fun into one night -- a chaotic adventure that no amount of book smarts could prepare them for.
